nodes.description: You're standing in front of the door to the locker room. It's your first time here since joining [% currentTerritory.name %].

You slide the door open and timidly poke your head in.
A man bellows at you from across the room.
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %]: "Way to be on time, kid.
Great impression on your first day."

commands.label: Ignore [% currentAntagonist.firstName %] and walk to locker

nodes.description:
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %] grabs you by the shoulder and spins you around
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %]: "HEY! You got a hearin' problem, boy?"

Player: "Sorry, I -"
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %]: "Yeah, you'd damn well better apologize boy. Now pick up my hat."
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %] throws his hat on the ground at your feet.

[% currentAntagonist.fullName %]: "Oh great, deaf and mute. You're gonna be a blast to work with in the ring.
I bet you can't even follow simple directions. Pick up my hat."
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %] throws his hat on the ground at your feet.

[% currentAntagonist.fullName %]: "That's a good boy. Now, put it on my head. GENTLY."
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %] throws his hat on the ground at your feet.

[% currentAntagonist.fullName %]: "I SAID PICK. UP. MY. HAT."
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %] gestures towards his hat, resting on the ground near your feet.

[% currentBooker.fullName %] walks in to the room clutching a piece of paper.
[% currentBooker.fullName %]: "[% currentAntagonist.lastName %]! Get the hell out to the ring, your music is already playing!"

[% currentAntagonist.fullName %] glares at you, then hurriedly stomps out the door.

The locker room goes mostly quiet. Small chuckles can be heard.
[% currentAntagonist.fullName %]: "Kid... You. Will. Regret. This."

[% currentBooker.fullName %] walks in to the room clutching a piece of paper.
[% currentBooker.fullName %]: "[% currentAntagonist.lastName %]! Get the hell out to the ring, your music is already playing!"

[% currentAntagonist.fullName %] glares at you, then hurriedly stomps out the door.
You cram [% currentAntagonist.firstName %]'s hat in the mostly full trashcan, covering it in all sorts of God-knows-what but leaving enough of it sticking out the top so he'll notice.
